entries.efe5f87b451f466e: {"accuracy": 5, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "Accurately translates 'svabh\u0101va \u015b\u016bny\u0101n' as 'r\u1ed7ng kh\u00f4ng v\u1ec1 t\u1ef1 t\u00e1nh' and maintains a formal, modern Vietnamese style."}
entries.b3580eafb0eecf6b: {"accuracy": 5, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "Perfectly captures the repetitive structure of the Sanskrit original while remaining natural in Vietnamese."}
entries.7dd1b6e701f6231d: {"accuracy": 5, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "Direct and accurate translation of the Sanskrit 'evam eva'."}
entries.7d1149ec82a70b04: {"accuracy": 5, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "Accurately translates 'an\u016bn\u0101 aparip\u016br\u1e47\u0101\u1e25' as 'kh\u00f4ng thi\u1ebfu kh\u00f4ng th\u1eeba', which is a precise modern equivalent to the Sino-Vietnamese 'b\u1ea5t t\u0103ng b\u1ea5t gi\u1ea3m'."}
entries.cc24c2f1b02e71fd: {"accuracy": 5, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "Correctly renders the locative '\u015b\u016bnyatay\u0101\u1e43' as 'trong kh\u00f4ng' and lists the aggregates accurately."}
entries.36c3e3f69119a316: {"accuracy": 5, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "Simple and accurate translation of the six sense organs."}
entries.30b2d764acbf246e: {"accuracy": 5, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "Simple and accurate translation of the six sense objects."}
entries.b6ed345cae1ba87a: {"accuracy": 5, "fluency": 4, "explanation": "Accurate, though 'gi\u1edbi nh\u00e3n' is slightly less common than 'nh\u00e3n gi\u1edbi' in standard Buddhist terminology, it remains correct."}
entries.5c36a5694bdfc99a: {"accuracy": 5, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "Accurately reflects the 'na... na... k\u1e63ayo' (neither... nor the end of...) structure."}
entries.f749702c33038488: {"accuracy": 5, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "Standard and accurate translation of the Four Noble Truths."}
entries.dc6f703940fddae9: {"accuracy": 5, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "Accurately translates 'na-apr\u0101pti\u1e25' (non-non-attainment), which is often omitted in shorter Chinese versions."}
entries.3f4176564accd6df: {"accuracy": 5, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "Correctly links the lack of attainment to the state of the Bodhisattva's mind."}
entries.58fadc26bd883c31: {"accuracy": 5, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "Precise translation of 'tryadhva' (three times/periods) and the attainment of enlightenment."}
entries.1495c22154c16474: {"accuracy": 5, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "Accurately renders the various descriptions of the mantra."}
entries.ecaef19a54626a42: {"accuracy": 5, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "Direct and clear introductory sentence for the mantra."}
entries.d1fb9bd7a0bfdcea: {"accuracy": 5, "fluency": 5, "explanation": "Standard transliteration of the Sanskrit mantra into Vietnamese phonetics."}
